values.description: Base URL for the Mercurio API
API Key for authentication (format: ak_xxxxx). Set this value after provisioning a tenant.
JWT token from Supabase authentication (Bearer token). Set this value after user login.
Tenant ID for multi-tenant operations. This will be auto-populated by the 'List Tenants' request.
Workspace ID for workspace-scoped operations. This will be auto-populated by the 'List Workspaces' request.
ID of tenant created during testing. Auto-populated by 'Create Tenant' request.
ID of workspace created during testing. Auto-populated by 'Create Workspace' request.
Funnel ID for funnel operations. Auto-populated by 'List Funnels' request.
ID of funnel created during testing. Auto-populated by 'Create Funnel' request.
